info.summary:
Bollinger Bands® depict volatility as standard deviation boundary lines from a moving average of price.
See documentation for more information.
info.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
info.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Width of bands. Number of Standard Deviations from the moving average.
info.returns: Time series of Bollinger Band and %B values.
